Member Function Documentation

static Version Cloo.Tools.ParseVersionString ( String  versionString,
int  substringIndex 
) [static]

Parses an OpenCL version string.

Parameters:
versionStringThe version string to parse. Must be in the format: Additional substrings[space][major_version].[minor_version][space]Additional substrings.
substringIndexThe index of the substring that specifies the OpenCL version.
Returns:
A Version instance containing the major and minor version from versionString .
